patthana15.27:1.1: Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.27:2.1: Sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.27:3.1: Sappaccayaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)
